reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Strengthening activities for achievement of goals 90-90-90 and STOP-TB in the Republic of Uzbekistan with Particular Focus on Most at Risk Population

description.narrative: Uzbekistan - TB/HIV - Republican Center to Fight AIDS - RAC. This program has the following goals: To achieve impactful, efficient and sustainable HIV and TB response in Uzbekistan. The objectives of this program are: To scale up access for early and quality HIV and TB diagnosis, treatment, care and prevention with focus on key affected populations. To ensure integrated care for populations affected both by TB and HIV infection. To strengthen national public health system response to ensure universal access to integrated people-centered health services, based on the evidence-based, human rights and gender-sensitive approach

title.narrative: Outcome indicator for UZB-C-RAC
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Treatment success rate of all forms of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, new and relapse cases
Treatment success rate of RR TB and/or MDR-TB: Percentage of cases with RR and/or MDR-TB successfully treated

TB treatment coverage: Percentage of new and relapse cases that were notified and treated among the estimated number of incident TB cases in the same year (all form of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed)
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Percentage of people who inject drugs reporting the use of sterile injecting equipment the last time they injected
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a non regular partner
Coverage / Output indicator for UZB-C-RAC
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Number of notified cases of all forms of TB (i.e. bacteriologically confirmed + clinically diagnosed), new and relapse cases
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Number of cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB that began second-line treatment
Percentage of people who inject drugs reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of people on ART among all people living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
Number of TB cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB notified
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of HIV-positive new and relapse TB patients on ART during TB treatment
Percentage of TB patients with DST result for at least Rifampicin among the total number of notified (new and retreatment) cases in the same year
Percentage of people who inject drugs that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Impact indicator for UZB-C-RAC
TB mortality rate per 100,000 population
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
RR-TB and/or MDR-TB prevalence among new TB patients: Proportion of new TB cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Percentage of people who inject drugs who are living with HIV
